description: Explorers from Dwarf Empire uncover ancient relics of the Centaur.
A rebellion led by Kobold dissidents shakes Gnome Empire.
Natural disasters ravage Human Empire, decimating the Warforged population.
A rebellion led by Kalashtar dissidents shakes Minotaur Empire.
A bloody war erupts between the Elf and Tiefling Empire.
A bloody war erupts between the Hobgoblin and Aasimar Empire.
Natural disasters ravage Human Empire, decimating the Hobgoblin population.
The Elf people form an alliance with Goblin Empire.
A new ruler of Half-Elf Empire, from the Genasi lineage, is crowned.
A rebellion led by Orc dissidents shakes Halfling Empire.
The Dwarf invent a new tool that revolutionizes life in Bugbear Empire.
A rebellion led by Changeling dissidents shakes Kobold Empire.
A new ruler of Minotaur Empire, from the Kalashtar lineage, is crowned.
Natural disasters ravage Orc Empire, decimating the Gnome population.
A new ruler of Changeling Empire, from the Human lineage, is crowned.
Explorers from Goblin Empire uncover ancient relics of the Human.
The Centaur people form an alliance with Centaur Empire.
The Goblin migrate en masse toward the borders of Human Empire.
The Genasi invent a new tool that revolutionizes life in Bugbear Empire.
The Dwarf migrate en masse toward the borders of Minotaur Empire.
A rebellion led by Warforged dissidents shakes Human Empire.
Explorers from Tiefling Empire uncover ancient relics of the Goblin.
